game.name: Donuts Cooking
game.description:
Donuts are extremely delicious and tasty treats with the availability in varied flavours and colours. Donuts Cooking is an awesome free online cooking game where you will have to create this awesome dessert on your own. Start this brand new game with visiting the nearest grocery store and shopping for everything required to prepare this wonderful dish. The proper cooking is needed before decorating them with some highly scrumptious and colourful frostings. Stay confident and do your best to explore this game further!

In this brand new online cooking game, you will have to beat some eggs first and then mix them with some other needful ingredients like softened butter, salt, sugar and milk. It is your responsibility to blend it with another mixture of vanilla extract, baking soda and flour. Use your hands to knead the dough and then leave it in a warm place to rest until it grows in its natural form. Spread it with a rolling pin and cut it using a cookie cutter in a shape of rounded donuts. 

Take a fry pan and fry your donuts in it with some hot boiling oil until they become golden brown. Use the toppings you want to decorate the scrumptious donuts. Complete their decoration part with the help of pink-heart shaped candy, colourful candy, nuts, strawberries, chocolate, syrups or sauces. Good luck to prepare the most appetizing donuts using your unmatched imagination power in this cool html5 game.
